name: Becamex Hotel New City
address: B2, Hung Vuong Street, Hoa Phu Ward, Thủ Dầu Một, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở trung tâm Thành phố mới của tỉnh Bình Dương, Becamex Hotel New City cung cấp các phòng nghỉ ở Xóm Bưng Ðìa, trong bán kính 31 km từ Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh. Quý khách có thể dùng bữa tại nhà hàng ngay trong khuôn viên hoặc thư giãn tại hồ bơi ngoài trời. Becamex Hotel New City cung cấp Wi-Fi miễn phí toàn khách sạn và chỗ đỗ xe riêng miễn phí tại chỗ.

Khách sạn cung cấp các phòng trang nhã và hiện đại với máy lạnh. Tất cả các phòng đều được trang bị truyền hình vệ tinh và minibar với chai nước uống miễn phí. Một số phòng có tủ lạnh và ban công. Phòng tắm riêng đi kèm góc tắm vòi sen mở, dép và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí.

Khách sạn cũng cung cấp các phòng cho mục đích tổ chức lễ cưới, sự kiện và công việc kinh doanh với sức chứa lên đến 1.000 người.

Khách sạn có lễ tân làm việc 24 giờ.

Khách có thể chơi tennis tại khách sạn. Becamex Hotel New City nằm trong khoảng cách đi bộ từ tòa nhà trung tâm hành chính của Bình Dương. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Tân Sơn Nhất, cách đó 27 km.

review.rating: Good place for a business stay!
review.comment_positive:
It is a very neat and modern looking building with nice staff. The rooms had suite size.
The breakfast has been excellent !
review.comment_negative:
The rooms are not very welcoming, but appear somewhat cold (white tiles and walls without decoration).
The hotel is situated in an industrial settlement. For a business stay, it offers a suitable space to spend the night and still find places for dinner in the evening. 
The area is nothing for a leisure trip.

review.rating: Suited our needs. Very quiet business neighbourhood.
review.comment_positive: Good nightly rate for one bedroom apartment and very good buffet breakfast.  The pool was very nice. We were there for a tennis tournament and the club was a 10min walk. Across the road there is a nice choice of restaurants and a food court.  Highly recommend the Italian pizza and pasta restaurant. The area is very quiet, not a lot happening. Hardly any traffic on the roads!!
review.comment_negative: It’s an apartment with a decent kitchen, but there were no pots, pans or even cutlery. The couch was in a terrible condition and needs a clean or replacent, and the TV remote did not work very well.  Floor tiles needs a re grout.

review.rating: Good stay.  Good for nusiness travelers.
review.comment_positive:
Good location for our needs.  Staff very friendly.  Excellent variety at breakfast in the hotel restaurant.  Many restaurants have recently been added in the area, so there are many options for evening dining.

Will stay again on my next trip.
review.comment_negative: I would like an ironing board and iron in the room for pressing clothes.  However, there is laundry service available for a fee.

review.rating: Tuyệt hảo
review.comment_positive: The staff are amazing, everything is beautifully clean and the pool is gorgeous. Although breakfast menu is limited, coffee is very good.
review.comment_negative: I believe this hotel is new, but there are already some signs of peeling paint. The design of the apartment is weird - TINY bedroom. Also needs some more furniture - doesn't look inviting.

review.rating: Functional hotel in excellent location for conferences....but not holidays.
review.comment_positive: Breakfast in the tastes restaurant was outstanding, with vietnamese, japanese, chinese and western alternatives available. In fact all of the food we had in that restaurant was great and decent value for money (considering it was a hotel restaurant). The staff were helpful and the hotel was clean.
review.comment_negative: I stayed in one of the apartment rooms. While it was sizeable and reasonably well equipped, it did miss an iron and ironing table, which were definitely hard to get hold of in the hotel. Also, the maintenance of the hallways needed a bit of work, with spot-painting having resulted in a mosaic of paint in the corridors. Biggest issues for me were the comfort of the bed, which was pretty stiff, the ability to block out light in the bedroom, the curtains didn't quite reach the edges, and the fact that there really isn't much around the hotel within walking distance other than the conference centre. It's a great hotel when you are attending a function or a conference, but I would take a hotel in the centre of Ho Chi Minh City every time for the convenience of being able to walk around and do stuff.
